data.text:
@chopper32 @HWarlow Yes. I love it. I bought my dad a print of the view of Torry with Cordiner's saw mill.
The house he was born in is in it.
He seemed genuinely excited.
Unusual.
Complained about what I had paid for it of course.
There is a negative for every positive! Love it. X
@KeithKSmith2 @HWarlow His work is exhibited in Aberdeen's hospitals.
